00048 /// String describing quantile norm algorithm
00049 #define ARTIFACTREDUCTIONSTR "artifact-reduction"
00050 #define ARTIFACTREDUCTIONTRUSTFILE "artifact-reduction-trust"
00051 
00052 /**
00053  * ArtifactReduction for doing normalization. Can do sketch and full
00054  * quantile (just set sketch to chip size) and supports bioconductor
00055  * compatibility. Unfortunatley this is kind of a bad stream currently as it
00056  * doesn't really flow any data through...
00057  */
00058 class ArtifactReduction : public ChipStream {
00059

00069    */

00072   /** 
00073    * @brief Add a stream to the list of those that will receive
00074    * downstream data.
00075    * @param stream - ChipStream that wants to be fed our modified
00076    * data.
00077    */
00078   virtual void registerStream(ChipStream *stream) {
00079     m_Streams.push_back(stream);
00080   }
00081   
00082   /** 
00083    * @brief register our parent stream that will be passing
00084    * data to this object.
00085    * @param stream - who are we getting data from?
00086    */
00087   virtual void registerParent(ChipStream *stream) {
00088     m_ParentStream = stream;
00089   }
00090 
00091   /** 
00092    * @brief Get a reference to our parent stream.
00093    * @return Reference to parent stream.
00094    */

00096     return *m_ParentStream;
00097   }
